example.content:
c-br-sp-spo-msv-rav-05#show ip bgp all summary For address family: IPv4 Unicast BGP router identifier 177.61.178.31, local AS number 27699 BGP table version is 7, main routing table version 7 6 network entries using 1488 bytes of memory 6 path entries using 720 bytes of memory 1/1 BGP path/bestpath attribute entries using 248 bytes of memory 2 BGP community entries using 48 bytes of memory 52 BGP extended community entries using 1280 bytes of memory 0 BGP route-map cache entries using 0 bytes of memory 0 BGP filter-list cache entries using 0 bytes of memory BGP using 3784 total bytes of memory Dampening enabled. 0 history paths, 0 dampened paths BGP activity 1928/0 prefixes, 1928/0 paths, scan interval 60 secs
Neighbor V AS MsgRcvd MsgSent TblVer InQ OutQ Up/Down State/PfxRcd 177.61.178.71 4 27699 1 2 1 0 0 00:00:05 OpenConfirm 192.171.1.114 4 36100 0 0 1 0 0 never Idle 198.18.0.14 4 27699 0 0 1 0 0 never Idle 200.207.191.119 4 27699 5339 5868 7 0 0 3d16h 0 200.207.195.61 4 4200000000 0 0 1 0 0 never Active
For address family: IPv6 Unicast BGP router identifier 177.61.178.31, local AS number 27699 BGP table version is 5, main routing table version 5 4 network entries using 1088 bytes of memory 4 path entries using 576 bytes of memory 1/1 BGP path/bestpath attribute entries using 248 bytes of memory 2 BGP community entries using 48 bytes of memory 52 BGP extended community entries using 1280 bytes of memory 0 BGP route-map cache entries using 0 bytes of memory 0 BGP filter-list cache entries using 0 bytes of memory BGP using 3240 total bytes of memory BGP activity 1928/0 prefixes, 1928/0 paths, scan interval 60 secs
Neighbor V AS MsgRcvd MsgSent TblVer InQ OutQ Up/Down State/PfxRcd 2001:12E0:B100:2E:200:207:195:61 4 4200000000 0 0 1 0 0 never Idle
For address family: IPv4 MDT BGP router identifier 177.61.178.31, local AS number 27699 BGP table version is 19, main routing table version 19 18 network entries using 4608 bytes of memory 18 path entries using 2304 bytes of memory 1/1 BGP path/bestpath attribute entries using 248 bytes of memory 2 BGP community entries using 48 bytes of memory 52 BGP extended community entries using 1280 bytes of memory 0 BGP route-map cache entries using 0 bytes of memory 0 BGP filter-list cache entries using 0 bytes of memory BGP using 8488 total bytes of memory BGP activity 1928/0 prefixes, 1928/0 paths, scan interval 60 secs
Neighbor V AS MsgRcvd MsgSent TblVer InQ OutQ Up/Down State/PfxRcd 177.61.178.73 4 27699 1 2 1 0 0 00:00:08 OpenConfirm 198.18.0.22 4 27699 0 0 1 0 0 never Idle
For address family: VPNv4 Unicast BGP router identifier 177.61.178.31, local AS number 27699 BGP table version is 88, main routing table version 88 87 network entries using 22272 bytes of memory 87 path entries using 10440 bytes of memory 61/61 BGP path/bestpath attribute entries using 16104 bytes of memory 2 BGP community entries using 48 bytes of memory 52 BGP extended community entries using 1280 bytes of memory 0 BGP route-map cache entries using 0 bytes of memory 0 BGP filter-list cache entries using 0 bytes of memory BGP using 50144 total bytes of memory BGP activity 1928/0 prefixes, 1928/0 paths, scan interval 60 secs

command.name: READ
command.output: # show ip bgp vpnv4 vrf V11011:SSII_SORIN summary # BGP neighbor status #Neighbor; V; AS; MsgRcvd; MsgSent; TblVer; InQ; OutQ; Up/Down; State/PfxRcd {$bgp_neighbor_status.$object_id.ip_bgp_neighbor}; {$bgp_neighbor_status.$object_id.ip_bgp_v}; {$bgp_neighbor_status.$object_id.ip_bgp_as}; {$bgp_neighbor_status.$object_id.ip_bgp_msg_rcvd}; {$bgp_neighbor_status.$object_id.ip_bgp_msg_sent}; {$bgp_neighbor_status.$object_id.ip_bgp_tbl_ver}; {$bgp_neighbor_status.$object_id.ip_bgp_in_queue}; {$bgp_neighbor_status.$object_id.ip_bgp_out_queue}; {$bgp_neighbor_status.$object_id.ip_bgp_up_down}; {$bgp_neighbor_status.$object_id.ip_bgp_state_pfxrcd};

command.name: LIST
